analysis.key_quote: Reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans, regardless of political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses clear opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the NIH and the integrity of federally-funded science, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and merit-based systems.
